item.description:
Unveil your deepest essence and discover your true quest, your wisdom, wildness and beauty.

In this gathering you will learn how to use yoga and other ancient practices to transcend habits of physical and emotional closure, how to open up to new opportunities and attract the right kind of energy into your life.

You will receive daily practice instructions for 21 days, which will firmly situate you on the path from Woman to Goddess, the path of rediscovering your femininity and your strength, the path that will bring you to the place you yearn.

When we practice together our power multiplies. Being a part of this ongoing, interactive women's circle will help you find greater meaning and deepen your commitment to the Goddess and to life itself. The time is now.

2pm - 3:30pm
Please, come 20 minutes in advance. The door will be closed at 2pm sharply.
$10

Love, Luba

P.S. - The Yoga studio, where we meet is located in Watertown - do not confuse it with Mt. Auburn Street in a different town.
item.name: From Woman to Goddess - Opening to Love
